property.name: type
property.label: Header type
property.description: The type of header to display: ontario, application, or serviceOntario.

property.name: applicationHeaderInfoJson
property.label: Application header info (JSON)
property.description: JSON object containing title, href, and maxWidth for application headers.

property.name: menuItemsJson
property.label: Menu items (JSON)
property.description: JSON array of menu items with title and href.

property.name: languageToggleOptionsJson
property.label: Language toggle options (JSON)
property.description: JSON object with englishLink and frenchLink URLs.

property.name: disableDynamicMenu
property.label: Disable dynamic menu
property.description: When true, disables fetching menu data from Ontario's API (recommended for Salesforce sites).

property.name: language
property.label: Language
property.description: The language for the header: en or fr.

property.name: assetBasePath
property.label: Asset base path
property.description: Base path for header assets (logos, icons). Leave empty to use default.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
